translations: vt.把……定名为，把……描述为；任命，指定；标明，标示（designate的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Some of the rooms were designated as offices.
sentences.translation: 其中一些房间是被指定用作办公室的。

sentences.sentence: Baker said he will use Shawon Dunston as his designated hitter tonight.
sentences.translation: 贝克说今晚他将会让肖恩·丹斯通担任他的指定击球手。

sentences.sentence: Who has she designated (as) her deputy?
sentences.translation: 她委任了谁为她的副手？
